data.name: Decanting Network
data.flavorText: Improvements in reliability and reduction of side effects will make repeated clonings possible.

data.name: Life Support Test Protocol
data.whenFulfilling: Gain 3 Isotopes at this Site; you may Discard a Colonist (this is a Felony).
data.flavorText: Advance testing of a starship's life support lessons for the journey.

data.name: Life Support Reconfig Team
data.fulfilledAbility: Your Bernals add to Colonist limit even when unanchored.
data.whenFulfilling: Gain 3 Isotopes at your Bernal; you may swap your Bernal cards (move each to the other Bernal Stack).
data.flavorText: A humanity itself will change due to the stress of interstellar journeys; its environment must change to match.

data.name: Isotope Fueling Station
data.destination: Your Factory of your Isostandard in Neptune zone.
data.fulfilledAbility: After you do a factory refuel op, gain 1 Isotope at that Factory.
data.flavorText: Isotope mining will be of central importance for the success of Project Exodus.

data.name: Warden Proving Ground
data.whenFulfilling: Gain 3 Isotopes at your Bernal; Promote your freighter or you may gain a Mobile Factory at your Bernal.
data.flavorText: You don't need to give untested autonomous systems a free hand, but you probably want to.

data.name: TW Evaluation Committee
data.fulfilledAbility: You may use Claim disks as delegates.
data.whenFulfilling: Gain 3 Isotopes at this Site; place 2 delegates on any 1 Ideology.
data.flavorText: Choosing a starship thruster is a one-time decision of tremendous importance.

data.name: Radiation Shield Prototype
data.destination: Mercury Site (0.630), then enter 2 Radiation Belt Spaces in the Saturn zone or beyond & Return.
data.fulfilledAbility: Your Stacks are immune to Belt CME Rolls.
data.flavorText: Radiation levels for Project Exodus require new passive systems for cryo-protection and shielding.

data.name: Rival Isobank
data.fulfilledAbility: You may exchange 1 Isotope per Turn at your Anchored non-Home Bernal for 6 Aquas.
data.flavorText: There will be a single centralized location for all Exomigration Isotopes. Unless there are two...

data.name: TW Stress Test
data.destination: Enter Solar Oberth, then Synodic Site, & Return.
data.fulfilledAbility: Your GW/TW thruster receives a Bonus Pivot.
data.flavorText: Starship thrusters will need to be for long duty cycles under difficult circumstances after planned or unplanned inactivity.

data.name: Iso-Exchange
data.fulfilledAbility: Produce your isostandard during a site refuel op at any Factory (with permission).
data.flavorText: Managing the exchange of different isotopes types is more profitable than mining it.

data.name: Deep Freeze
data.fulfilledAbility: Before exomigrating, you may Discard the top card from the queue you are drawing from.
data.flavorText: Cryogenic techniques can preserve the genome of a species at near absolute zero.

data.name: Atmospheric Iso-Refinery
data.fulfilledAbility: If your GW/TW thruster ends its move on an Aerobrake Hazard, that Stack gains 1 isotope.
data.flavorText: Atmospheric scooping can process vast volumes to find trace isotopes useful as fuel.
